trajectory.content:
入院日期：2010-06-26
性别：男
初次病理诊断年龄：83
种族：白人
族裔：非西班牙裔或拉丁裔
提交的肿瘤部位：结肠
其他恶性肿瘤史：无
新辅助治疗史：无
初次病理诊断年份：2010
解剖器官子分部：升结肠
诊断时体重（kg）：75
诊断时身高（cm）：168

获取时结肠息肉指标：是

trajectory.content_en:
Admission Date: 2010-06-26
Gender: MALE
Age at Initial Pathologic Diagnosis: 83
Race: WHITE
Ethnicity: NOT HISPANIC OR LATINO
Submitted Tumor Site: Colon
History of Other Malignancy: NO
History of Neoadjuvant Treatment: No
Year of Initial Pathologic Diagnosis: 2010
Anatomic Organ Subdivision: Ascending Colon
Weight at Diagnosis (kg): 75
Height at Diagnosis (cm): 168
History of Colon Polyps: NO
Colon Polyps at Procurement Indicator: YES
Family History of Colorectal Cancer: 0

Here's a detailed summary of the pathological report:
Clinical Information:
- Diagnosis: Cancer of the large intestine
Examination Details:
- Specimen:
- 19.9 cm segment of the large intestine with peri-intestinal tissue (25 x 13 x 3 cm)
- 8 cm segment of the small intestine
- 7 cm appendix
Macroscopic Description:
- Tumor:
- Cauliflower-shaped, located in the intestinal mucosa
- Size: 4.7 x 9.3 x 1.2 cm
- Involves 100% of the intestine's circumference
- Proximity: 9.2 cm from the proximal cut end, 12.2 cm from the distal cut end, and 1.2 cm from the ileocecal valve
- Additional Findings:
- Polyps up to 1.5 cm in size
Microscopic Description:
- Tumor Type:
- Tubulopapillary adenocarcinoma, partially mucinous (G3 grade)
- Deep infiltration into the muscular layer and pericolonic adipose tissue
- Other Findings:
- Intestine ends free of neoplastic lesions
- Tubulopapillary adenomas with moderate to severe dysplasia
- Reactive lymphonodulitis (No VII)
- Appendix without lesions
Histopathological Diagnosis:
- Primary Diagnosis: Tubulopapillary adenocarcinoma, partially mucinous, of the colon (G3; Dukes B; Astler-Coller B2; pT3; pNO)
- Secondary Findings: Tubulopapillary adenomas with high-grade dysplasia
trajectory.content:
以下是病理报告的详细摘要：
临床信息：
- 诊断：结肠癌
检查细节：
- 标本：
- 大肠段（25 x 13 x 3 cm）及周围组织，长度为19.9厘米
- 小肠段，长度为8厘米
- 阑尾，长度为7厘米
宏观描述：
- 肿瘤：
- 菜花状，位于肠黏膜
- 大小：4.7 x 9.3 x 1.2厘米
- 涉及整个肠周
- 位置：距离近端切口9.2厘米，距离远端切口12.2厘米，距离回盲瓣1.2厘米
- 附加发现：
- 多发性息肉，最大直径1.5厘米
微观描述：
- 肿瘤类型：
- 管状乳头状腺癌，部分为黏液性（G3级）
- 深度浸润至肌层和周围脂肪组织
- 其他发现：
- 肠段两端无肿瘤病变
- 管状乳头状腺瘤，中度至重度不典型增生
- 反应性淋巴结炎（No VII）
- 阑尾无病变
病理诊断：
- 主要诊断：结肠管状乳头状腺癌，部分为黏液性（G3；Dukes B；Astler-Coller B2；pT3；pNO）
- 次要发现：管状乳头状腺瘤，高度不典型增生
